data.text: @Ronaldocze Hello, in order to review this with you further, please send us the booking reference (6 letter) and full name of the passenger via DM. Thank you for contacting us, we’ll stay tuned. Regards.
@TheReegz2 Hi, We are glad to have you on board. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Hello, we've answered you through DM. Regards.

We know that the closure of the Chilean borders may change your plans, so remember that if your flight is scheduled between July 1st and 14th, you can choose among different options in the My Trips section at https://t.co/pxuBw9jPIv
#AttentionPassengers: Get to know the international flights available to/from Chile until July 15th. Please check the details at https://t.co/YHkcdSBdOr https://t.co/VRlhR6ULir
@NidalMOKH Hola, te hemos respondido a través de DM. Saludos.

@NidalMOKH Hola, indícanos el nombre completo del pasajero, código de reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 dígitos) junto con los detalles del cambio que requieres vía DM para asistirte. Quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@Jeffrey_Mayhew Jeff, in order to be able to assist you through this means, please provide us with your email address, itinerary, dates, and passenger full name via DM to verify if there is already a payment attempt in our system. We will be waiting for your reply.

@Jeffrey_Mayhew Hi Jeff, sometimes our website can be affected. We suggest you to delete the history and the cookies on your computer. If it does not work, you can try using a different browser. If you keep having issues, send us the screenshot of the error. Regards.
@brandon_mor Hello, we sent you a response via DM. Regards
@babybluemv Hello, we sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@MrFrancois82 Hello, we answered you through DM. Regards.
@Keoni_KuKiai We have left internal notes in your case 33285589 so that you can be contacted as soon as possible via email. Kind regards.

urls.title: Log in to Twitter / Twitter
urls.description: Log in to Twitter to see the latest. Join the conversation, follow accounts, see your Home Timeline, and catch up on Tweets from the people you know.

data.text: @Keoni_KuKiai Hi Keoni, in order to help you, please provide us the reservation code or the ticket number and the full name of the passenger via DM. We will be waiting for your reply. https://t.co/Hp7JCSCLdS
@connieql213 Hi Connie, please send us more details about your case through direct message in order to assist you. We will be awaiting your message.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a message via DM. Regards.

@NicoFigueroa Hola, para poder asistirte envíanos tu código de reserva o número de ticket y nombre y apellido completo del pasajero. Agradecemos tu contacto y quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@airuhkaa Hi, let us check the information, please provide via DM the booking code, ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.

@bravosierra68 Hello, pleased to greet you. In order to assist you, send us through DM the reservation code (six uppercase letters) and/or electronic ticket number with the full name of one of the passengers. We'll be aware of your response. Regards.
@enedland We would like to review your case, please indicate us by DM your reservation code, case number or ticket number. We stay tuned.

@AnaJ_NY Hi, we will gradually start to reopen our VIP Lounges. Depending on when the local health authorities allow us to move forward, we will continue with the opening of the VIP Lounges in Bogotá, Buenos Aires and Santiago. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Jeremy, for privacy, we ask you to hide your tweet, and reply through direct message. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Hello Jeremy, in order to check the status of your request, please send us your reference number. Thank you for contacting us. Regards.

Pride doesn’t know limits or borders, and we want everyone to feel free to express it. Let’s show you what we did on this Pride Day at different airports in the region. Because living in a world without labels makes us fly 🌈 #WeOnlyLabelLuggage https://t.co/uYFpaOKPbq

entity.name: Pride Month
entity.description: Page for Global Pride Month for all years

data.text: @jclechin Hola, indícanos tu código de reserva o número de ticket por DM para poder validar lo que nos comentas, quedamos atentos. Saludos.

@JulsMV17 Hello, we will take into account all you've mentioned to improve the quality of our service. Moreover, if you have any request we can assist you with, let us know by DM. We'll stay tuned. Kind regards.

urls.title: Travel requirements | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Know the restrictions to travel inside and outside of United States.

data.text: @carlosarias10 Hi, test type accepted are antigen or a nucleic acid amplification test (NAAT), including but not restricted to RT-PCR, RT-LAMP, TMA, NEAR, and HDA no more than 3 days before the travel into the country. Find more information about it here: https://t.co/mvTd7sKoWb. Regards.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text: #Remember: The use of a mask is mandatory at all times during your journey, regardless of your vaccination status. Check out our policy on the use of Permitted Masks at: https://t.co/aogQ59ROYv https://t.co/GKl0qtpVpF
@Shahidu40388639 Hello, please send us a formal proposal and your contact information via DM. In case of being interested we would be contacting you. We’ll stay tuned. Regards.

@gabrielelizondo Gabriel, in order to schedule a call and complete the payment through the phone, send us by DM your phone number with area code, the route and itinerary of the flight that you want, and the email address that you used while making the reservation. We'll be awaiting your response.

@gabrielelizondo Hi Gabriel, sometimes our website can be affected. We suggest you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer. If it does not work, you can try using a different browser. If you keep having problems let us so, we can schedule a call in order to assist you. Regards.

@SchertelFC Hi Felipe, sometimes our website can be affected. We suggest you to delete the history and/or the cookies on your computer. If it does not work, you can try using a different browser, if you keep having problems, let us know to schedule a call and help you. Regards.
@equis_deola Hola, indícanos por DM en qué podemos asistirte. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.

@lo13gan Hello, please send us via DM your refund request number or your booking reference (6 letters), ticket number (13 digits) and full name of the passenger. Thank for contacting us, we’ll stay tuned. Regards.
@kasius11 Hi, please send us your full name and details of your request including your reservation code or ticket number through DM to verify how we can help you. Regards.

We believe in inclusion and that we must all respect each other despite our differences; that's why #WeOnlyLabelLuggage and never label people. Living in a world without labels makes us fly 🌈 https://t.co/mMCjVdasBe
@jeremyatl1 Hello, we sent you a DM. Regards.
@GoncalvesAdemar Hello, you can formalize your claim at this link: https://t.co/L1cWt8reoL. Regards.

@GoncalvesAdemar Hello, there is an option to unsubscribe from our emails. Open one of our mails, then go to the right bottom corner of the message and you will find in small letters the link to unsubscribe. Regards.
@kurter21 Hello, please send us further information about your request via DM in order to help you. Regards.
@hensfo We answer you by DM. Regards.
@hensfo Hello Hendrik, we don't have any reported problem, you can also try our Latam app, if you have problems in our app, you can send us a DM with the passengers details to assist you. Regards.

@angela16042536 Hi, in order to assist you send us by DM, your case number or the reservation code (6 digits) or the ticket number(13 digits) and please confirm the passenger's full name. We'll be awaiting your response. Regards.
@Claudinha_19 Hi, we replied to you through DM. Regards.
@Brian29485902 Hello, in order to assist you, please tell us by DM your reservation code and full name of the passenger. We stay tuned.

@KewinCosmos Hello, pleased to greet you. In order to assist you, send us through DM the reservation code (six uppercase letters) and/or electronic ticket number (13 digits) with the full name of one of the passenger. We'll be aware of your response.
@g_l_johnson Hello, please send us via DM your booking code (6 letters) or your original ticket number (13 numbers). We will await for your reply, regards.
@Bowman_John In order to help you, send us by DM more details about your request. We stay tuned.
@RafaelCouto_rc Hi, bear in mind that regulations will also be according to the country you buy from. Kind regards.
@RafaelCouto_rc Hi, our prices are according to the country where you are buying from. Best regards.

If you are traveling from Miami you can get you PCR or Antigen Test with our testing partner Body K. You can book it online by entering https://t.co/JneGpLemUL and have a 10% off. https://t.co/Yz3210mfr7

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @KaTiiTaIR Hi, for a proper assistance, please choose just one language Spanish or English. Also, let us know via DM your phone number that you used when calling our contact center and further information about your query. We'll be awaiting your reply.
@jeremyatl1 Hi, we replied to you through DM. Regards.
@valiuh Hi, we will give you an answer through direct message. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@miquele2009 Hello, send us by DM the reservation code, full name of the passengers and new dates you want by means of a screenshot. We look forward to your contact.
@jeremyatl1 We will contact you with an answer. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Hi, we are still working on your case and we will send you an email with more information. Regards.

@driessen_anna Hi, through this means we can assist you, please provide via DM, the booking code or the ticket number and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. Also, please let us know further information about your requirement. We'll be awaiting your reply.
@edsontimoteo Olá Edson, o caso já está sendo analisado pelo protocolo #32839481. Assim que tivermos uma resposta, você será notificado imediatamente. Estamos à disposição.
@rmdelatorre In order to check the information, please provide via DM, the booking code and the ticket number (13 digits). We'll be awaiting your reply.
@rmdelatorre Hi, it will be recognized if you enter your frequent flyer number into your booking. Regards.
@t2in2rs Hi, could you please send us by DM your booking code (6 capital letter) or electronic ticket number (13 digits) also, the full name of the passenger to verify the situation.

@SteveO025 Hello, in order to assist you, send us through DM the ticket number (13 digits), if you don't have it; send us the flight number, passenger's full name, flight date with departing and destination. We'll be aware to your response. Kind regards.

@matiass74100462 Hola, Para brindarte una mejor asesoría, es necesario que nos envíes vía DM la información de tu reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 números), indicándonos los nombres de los pasajeros. Saludos.

@SoSuperfreak Hola, es un gusto saludarte, para verificar tu solicitud, es necesario que nos envíes vía DM (mensaje interno) el código de reserva (6 letras) o el número del ticket (13 números) y el nombre completo del pasajero. Quedamos atentos a tus comentarios. Saludos.
@Aboundlessworld Hello Bud! Thank you so much for your message, we are glad you had a pleasant experience. Have a great day!
@ramosri Ricardo, una vez que tengamos respuesta o mayores detalles, nos estaremos comunicando a través de correo electrónico. Saludos.

@ramosri Hola, entendemos tu malestar ante la situación, sin embargo podemos garantizarte que te daremos respuesta a través de tu correo electrónico, tan pronto como tengamos alguna novedad al respecto. Saludos.
@RoseZCOcl Hello, We have written to you via DM.
@gmoskovicz Hola, te enviamos un DM. Saludos.
@gmoskovicz Gabriel, para asistirte envíanos por DM los datos completos del pasajero y los datos del vuelo. Estaremos atentos.
@gatoibu Comprendemos tu molestia, y tan pronto tengamos información te lo haremos saber vía e-mail. Conoce el estado de tu caso, aquí: https://t.co/ZhoDWx2AQb. Saludos.
@mattallmer Hello, we just sent to you DM. Regards.
@gatoibu Hola, continuamos trabajando en tu caso y te entregaremos una respuesta lo antes posible. Saludos.

@gatoibu Hola, nos mantenemos trabajando en tu solicitud para asistirte lo más pronto posible, te pedimos por favor aguardes por nuestro contacto a través del medio correspondiente ante cualquier novedad. Saludos.
@jeremyatl1 We have answered you via DM. Regards.
@shoalCreekRebel Hi, we gave you an answer through direct message. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@shoalCreekRebel Hi, in order to verify how we can help you, please detail through DM what are the reservation codes you are referring to, and let us know the case number if you already have one. We will be waiting for your response. Regards.

We recommend that you keep up to date about the mandatory requirements for your next flight. To do it, you will find several options on our website that will give you the updated information that you need to know before your trip. Visit: https://t.co/x2aX1biwFo https://t.co/FCVgvkPcWC
@megan_jay14 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@megan_jay14 Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code or ticket number. If you don't have them, send us the flight number, route and dates of travel. Regards.
@victorinaperez2 Te contactaremos a través del caso al obtener una respuesta final. Saludos.
@jeremyatl1 We will contact you with an answer. Regards.
@biciklomposvetu We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
@delacruzjay We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@delacruzjay We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@delacruzjay Hi, we replied to you via DM. Regards.
@delacruzjay Hi, in order to check the details of your request, please send us through DM your reservation code or ticket number. Regards.
@jeremyatl1 Jeremy, we're still working on the case. Regards.
@Aboundlessworld Hello, let us know the booking code or ticket number through DM in order to give you the options. Regards.
@valiuh Hola, envíanos un mensaje vía DM con tu ruta, fecha, correo electrónico y nombre de pasajero para asistirte, recuerda no compartir tus datos personales de forma pública. Quedamos atentos.
@miquele2009 We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@miquele2009 Hi, we have sent you information by DM. Regards.
@Aboundlessworld We sent you a response via DM, regards.
@Aboundlessworld Hi, we have sent you information by DM. Regards.
@rrcrazy23 Hello, we answered you by DM, greetings.
@jeremyatl1 We have sent you a response via DM, regards.
